item.title: Aggresion=\ plz help
item.dc:creator: @swatzoo9 swatzoo9
item.description:
@swatzoo9 wrote:

ok i put in aggresion but all it do is make if u walk close enough near them they att u but dont folo u they stand and like turn where u walk but dont move…when u arent atting them they move fine this is a 508 server so please help here is the code

}

private void checkNPC() {
switch (npcType) {
case 2745:
npcAggression(npcId);
break;
case 6208: /* The #s represent your NPC’s ID /
npcAggression(npcId);
case 6204: / The #s represent your NPC’s ID /
npcAggression(npcId);
case 6260: / The #s represent your NPC’s ID /
npcAggression(npcId);
case 6261: / The #s represent your NPC’s ID /
npcAggression(npcId);
case 6263: / The #s represent your NPC’s ID /
npcAggression(npcId);
case 6265: / The #s represent your NPC’s ID */
npcAggression(npcId);
default:
return;
}
}
public void appendPlayerFollowing(NPC n){
for (Player p : Engine.players) {
if (p == null)
return;

int i = p.absX;
int j = p.absY;
if ((j < n.absY) && (i == n.absX)) {
  n.moveX = 0;
  n.moveY = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absY, j + 1);
} else if ((j > n.absY) && (i == n.absX)) {
  n.moveX = 0;
  n.moveY = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absY, j - 1);
} else if ((i < n.absX) && (j == n.absY)) {
  n.moveX = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absX, i + 1);
  n.moveY = 0;
} else if ((i > n.absX) && (j == n.absY)) {
  n.moveX = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absX, i - 1);
  n.moveY = 0;
} else if ((i < absX) && (j < n.absY)) {
  n.moveX = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absX, i + 1);
  n.moveY = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absY, j + 1);
} else if ((i > n.absX) && (j > n.absY)) {
  n.moveX = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absX, i - 1);
  n.moveY = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absY, j - 1);
} else if ((i < n.absX) && (j > n.absY)) {
  n.moveX = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absX, i + 1);
  n.moveY = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absY, j - 1);
} else if ((i > n.absX) && (j < n.absY)) {
  n.moveX = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absX, i - 1);
  n.moveY = Engine.npcMovement.getMove(n.absY, j + 1);
}
Engine.npcMovement.getNextNPCMovement(n);

}
